Computer's Board


Placing the ships

The information regarding the current ship to be placed on the board is shown. This includes the ship no. and its length. Its orientation can be chosen by you. Then click on the the appropriate cell which you think should be then starting location of your ship. If you click in a location where the ship cannot be placed you wont see the ship being placed. Click on a valid location and your ship would appear.
